body.p:
191
May 3rd 4
Hon. E M Stanton
Sec'y of War
Washington City.

The time allowed for raising Six months troops is too limited to effect much. Those sections which furnish our troops -- would, not be notified in time, to complete organizations I must therefore decline the attempt.

Tho. E. Bramlette
Gov. of Ky.
